summary: Interactive romantic single-page Valentine proposal website with centered main question, playful YES/NO interactions, responsive design, optional music/sfx, and a celebratory heart/confetti/emoji explosion with enhanced physics on YES click.
architectural_notes: Single-page interactive web experience; central focus is the main Valentine question with minimal extra text.
Use requestAnimationFrame for physics-driven celebration particles/hearts; stop/fade effects after a few seconds to prevent clutter/perf issues.
NO button must be non-interactive (no click, no keyboard focus) and respond to both pointer hover and touch/pointerdown on mobile.
Mobile-first responsive layout using relative units (vw/vh/%/rem) and media queries; support portrait/landscape.
Include optional audio via a user-controlled toggle; avoid autoplay that may be blocked by browsers.

existing_features.title: Make the evasive "NO" button start moving around immediately from initial page load (not only after hover/tap), while keeping its current evasive behavior on hover/tap (random relocation, slightly smaller, slightly faster, phrase progression).
Ensure the evasive "NO" button is never keyboard-focusable/selectable (including Tab navigation) and remains effectively unclickable on all supported devices.
Keep the new phrase exactly as provided in the evasive "NO" button phrase progression list: `One More  Chance ü•∫üíùüíï, Please Binnu!! üôè üôè `.

After clicking YES (when the proposal state is celebrating or completed), increase/fill the heart background effect so it is noticeably denser and visually concentrated toward the bottom of the viewport.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create romantic single-page Valentine proposal page with centered main question, romantic typography, gradient background, bokeh/glow, and subtle floating heart particles + heartbeat pulse animation
Implement YES button: large rounded gradient button with glow/hover bounce; stays fixed in place; clicking triggers celebration sequence and modal

Implement evasive NO button: moves away on hover/tap, becomes smaller/faster, dynamic phrases (including 'One More  Chance ü•∫üíùüíï, Please Binnu!! üôè üôè'), never clickable, and not focusable via keyboard/tab; also start moving from the beginning
YES click celebration: screen explosion with 3D animated hearts, floating emojis, heart confetti, background darken, zoom toward center, and glassmorphism romantic modal with sparkles/heart outlines

Enhanced heart explosion physics: requestAnimationFrame loop with randomized velocity/rotation, gravity, bounce with damping off edges, settle/fade after a few seconds; increase/fill 3D hearts especially near bottom after YES

Full responsiveness across mobile/tablet/desktop with relative units and media queries; ensure centered main question; scale buttons proportionally; support portrait/landscape; ensure touch interactions (NO dodges finger tap) and prevent overflow/cutoffs
Add optional background music with toggle plus click/celebration sound effects; add subtle emoji reactions near cursor
Prevent accidental refresh from ruining the experience (e.g., guard/confirmation or state persistence) and keep animations smooth/performance-optimized (no jank, mobile-friendly)
